question: **You have borrowed something from your friend and it got damaged.****Write a letter to your friend. In the letter:**- **apologise for the damage to the item**- **explain what happened**- **say how you are going to fix the issue**
text: Hope this letter finds you in  radiant health and the best of your spirits. First of all,  let me thank you  once again for the wonderful experience I had with you at your place last month. You are such a good host. But, I must apologize to you now because the dress, you gave me, has been damaged accidentally.

Let me explain to you what actually happened. I ironed the apparel and hung it to a door and went  to take a shower. Unfortunately, when I was taking  the shower, my dog ate a small part of that dress and I know it was a very costly one from the band W. I apologise for the inconvenience caused.
Luckily, I have checked online that the same dress is still available at a nearby store. I paid online for that and will bring the same attire tomorrow.
Say my regards to your family.
